chapters.title: Chapter 38: Maidens of the Spear
chapters.info: Aviendha, p. 432 (346)—Aiel of the Bitter Water sept of the Taardad Aiel. She is Far Dareis Mai, a Maiden of the Spear. She is the woman who jumps in front of Egwene, Elayne, and Nynaeve, as well as the one who follows them and helps free them when they are captured. Editor's note: In later books, Aviendha's sept is referred to as the Nine Valleys sept. It is not known whether she changed septs, her sept was renamed, or the author simply made an oversight.
